A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Critics will love this film\, fans not so much. Lots of new things to love and some great additions to the universe. However it didn't feel like an episode\, there was almost no follow through on the part fans wanted fleshed out the most\, many jokes and odd choices made across the board. Will still be seeing every movie related\, just not a classic...loved half of it\, hated the other.
